Detailed Description

This class is used to represent a polygon.

Member Function Documentation

bool WorldPolygon::chop ( const PlaneEq &  planeEq  ) 

This method chops this polygon by the input plane.

Only the part of the polygon in the half-space in front of the plane equation is kept.

Returns:
true if the chopped poly is valid, false if not

void WorldPolygon::split ( const PlaneEq &  planeEq,
WorldPolygon &  frontPoly,
WorldPolygon &  backPoly 
) const

This method splits this polygon into the two polygons based on the input plane.

Parameters:
planeEq The partitioning plane.
frontPoly The polygon in front of the partitioning plane is put in here.
backPoly The polygon behind the partitioning plane is put in here.
